name: rvm
description: Installs and configures RVM, optionally keeping it updated.

recipes.rvm::install: installs a ruby based on attribute configuration
recipes.rvm::ruby_192: uses rvm::install to install mri ruby 1.9.2
recipes.rvm::ruby_187: uses rvm::install to install mri ruby 1.8.7
recipes.rvm::ree: uses rvm::install to install ruby enterprise edition
